Sequencing run sample renaming

Prepare files for dada2.
```{r libraries}
devtools::source_url("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/strejcem/cleanSeqTools/master/R/cleanSeqTools.R")
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r rename}
plates <- 1
dir.create("renamed")

for(i in plates){
  renameByID(dir.from = paste0("source/"),
           dir.to = "renamed/",
           extension = "fastq.*",
           csvFile = paste0("source/MiSeq25-10.csv"),
           demuxy_format = "A1"
           )
}

```
